member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_FIELD_STATE
member.summary: Specifies the state of a single field in the Credential UI. Used by and . The behavior of fields may vary depending on the current field state.

member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_FIELD_STATE.CPFS_HIDDEN
member.summary: Do not show the field in any state. One example of this would be a password edit control that should not be displayed until the user authenticates a thumb print. Until the thumb print has been authenticated, the state of the password field would be CPFS_HIDDEN.

member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_FIELD_STATE.CPFS_DISPLAY_IN_SELECTED_TILE
member.summary: Show the field when in the selected state.

member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_FIELD_STATE.CPFS_DISPLAY_IN_DESELECTED_TILE
member.summary: Show the field when in the deselected state. This value is only valid for a is set to CPUS_CREDUI.

member.name: CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER_FIELD_STATE.CPFS_DISPLAY_IN_BOTH
member.summary: Show the field both when the credential tile is selected and when it is not selected.
